DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess feasibility impact introduce subsidized malaria rapid diagnostic test ( RDTs ) retail sector drug shop Uganda . This randomize controlled trial village level , take place 6 district Eastern Uganda . Licensed drug shop select village train proper RDT storage , administration , interpretation disposal give access subsidize RDTs sale . This study explore whether drug shop owner -- give access train subsidized RDTs -- choose promote sell RDTs customer , , volume price . The investigator also explore whether shop safely store , administer , interpret dispose RDTs extent use RDT result guide treatment recommendation . Finally , study explore whether make RDTs available sale local drug shop community level impact diagnostic test appropriate treatment malaria .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Impact Malaria Rapid Diagnostic Tests African Retail Sector
